profile.name: Sammy Kohg
profile.introduction: Hi, I'm Sammy and I'm an IT student at the University of Technology, Sydney. I'm originally from Germany, and I decided to start this diary to practice my English.

interest.name: TV
interest.description: I like to watch the football show.

entry.title: I bought a new phone
entry.body: Today I bought a Galaxy S III to replace my old iPhone.

entry.title: Busy day
entry.body: I have 3 assignments due today. I need coffee!
